p: Finally, we summarized the ensemble of predicted species distributions (two algorithms x three pseudo-absences x models with TSS>0.5) using the committee average method, where probabilities from different models were first transformed into binary according to a threshold (here, the TSS cut-off threshold) and then averaged [ 44]. In the end, seven consensual maps were generated per species (one for each scenario: current, and RCPs 2.6, 6.0, 8.5 for 2050 and 2070).
